title: Should I audition to become an idol during the Coronavirus pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s absolutely alright to audition, after all, you likely have a lot of time on your hands and won’t have to deal with traveling to an audition site or waiting in lines, you can simply send in a video. It’s likely not safe to be traveling, however, and companies may not even ask you to until it’s safer.

My answer for you is- NO because no one knows who is covid-19 patient and sometimes the patient also do not know himself or herself life is more important and( I do not think they will take the audition) in this kind of situation so do not and if you go so just be careful Ok. Best of luck! And stay safe!
